channel.title: RuneState -Market and fun!-
channel.description:
[img]http://runestate.site90.com/Upload/images/halflife/logo.png[/img]
Hello welcome to My Runestate thread, rune-state is a fun Community that was made so people can enjoy posting while having fun. it can also help your server greatly we offer more then just any communite... we have 5 loaders that are 100% working...
[b]Loaders:[/b]
[ol][li]ChronicPvp Loader[/li] [li]Luckscape loader[/li] [li]TrisdiaX loader[/li] [li]Hybridpvp loader[/li] [li]Vernizpkz loader[/li][/ol]
[b]Many more loaders coming soon![/b]
[i]we also have a Currency System called RuneStateCurrency, you can use to purchase Gold Banners and advertise your Server without paying![/i] we also have Staff that are experinced in Coding not like Rs-ps where there staff is shit.
Please Help us get around by using this as your signature: [code][img]http://runestate.site90.com/Upload/images/halflife/logo.png[/img][/code]
Features:
[ol][li]Great Template[/li] [li]Many loaders[/li] [li]Great Staff support[/li] [li]Great forum and Contests[/li] [li]Hurrie and join today![/li][/ol]
Pictures:
[img]http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/1716/7fbe9b5a08304cccb3c9ae9x.png[/img]
[img]http://img803.imageshack.us/img803/6605/0f39b842cd334814803235f.png[/img]
[img]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/2959/4663a4c64aff4806b3e9b7d.png[/img]
[img]http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/2637/d06603d129a7499fb330da5.png[/img]
Please Join at
http://runestate.org or http://rune-state.com
